description.gold-silver:
An icy punch. May
cause freezing.
description.crystal:
An icy punch. May
cause freezing.
description.ruby-sapphire:
An icy punch that may
freeze the foe.

An icy punch that may
freeze the foe.

with an icy fist.

foe frozen.

with an icy fist.
